summary: Cameroon is a country in Central Africa with a diverse culture and landscape. It borders several nations and has a long Atlantic coastline. With over 250 native languages, English and French are the official tongues. The country's history includes German colonization and later division between France and the UK. It gained independence in stages between 1960 and 1961. Cameroon has faced tensions between English and French-speaking regions. The country is known for its music and successful football team, and it belongs to many international organizations.
title: Cameroon
